#summary Source code

== Command-Line Access ==

Use this command to check out the latest project source code:

{{{
hg clone http://hg.sympy.org/sympy
}}}

== Online access ==

You can browse the repository online at the same address: http://hg.sympy.org/sympy

You may also go to the original googlecode [http://code.google.com/p/sympy/source/checkout Source tab].
